description: Embrace the warmth of the family-friendly Broadview subdivision with this charming 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom home, fully renovated and ready for its next occupants. Step inside and be greeted by the beautifully restored original hardwood floors, a sunlit living room featuring brand-new windows, and a cozy wood-burning fireplace that's perfect for the approaching fall and winter seasons. The kitchen has been tastefully updated and is fully equipped, with all appliances included. Conveniently adjacent to the kitchen is a laundry room, complete with a washer and dryer for your convenience. Step outside to a partially fenced backyard, featuring a lovely patio that's just right for hosting BBQs and outdoor gatherings. This is a home that's ready for you to move in and make your own. Schedule your tour today!
